fxInfo_label: Government revenues from oil, gas, and minerals
fxInfo_clarification: Fiscal Reliance includes taxes and royalties paid by either privately-owned or stateowned oil and mining firms, as well as dividend payments or direct transfers paid to the government by state-owned firms. Coverage starts from a country’s first year of independence(or 1800) to 2006.
fxInfo_question: What percentage of a country’s government revenues come from oil, natural gas, and minerals?
name: e_Fiscal_Reliance
